attributes.action: Ban the sale of loud fireworks and loud displays
attributes.additional_details: With the technology we have there is no need for these loud displays as they can have music broadcast to accompany them that  anyone can listen on their personal devices.
attributes.background:
As a dog owner the weeks around Bonfire night are very stressful, if our Labrador hears one loud bang he is inconsolable for hours. 
It’s not only pet owners but people suffering with PTSD and other anxiety conditions that are affected by this unnecessary noise

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make fireworks quieter: Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590838

Ban use and sale of non-silent fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599451
